item.title: Teleport Block (Need Someone with 15+ Rep)
item.dc:creator: @baseball4355 baseball4355
item.description:
@baseball4355 wrote:

[quote=“Destiny 517, post:4, topic:342996”]case 16116:
p.setCoords(3394, 3083, 0);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Welcome Back!”);
} else if (p.teleblocked) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You are teleport blocked!”);
return;
}
break;

i did that and got 5 errors? got team viewer to show me what you meen?[/quote]

show me the errors, i might be able to help you. make sure that there is a variable called teleblocked otherwise you cant put it and expect it to know what teleblocked means

item.title: Teleport Block (Need Someone with 15+ Rep)
item.dc:creator: @Destiny_517 Destiny 517
item.description:
@Destiny_517 wrote:

Well, okay i made a server outa my 517, and i took out commands and the commands had a code to where if you got tele’blocked you cannot teleport as in ::fog and if you where teleport blocked it would say you know the usual (“You are teleportblocked and cannot teleport.”)

etc… well i wana make it like that for objects so i took the line of code and put it with my cases in objectoption1 like this.

case 16116:
p.setCoords(3394, 3083, 0);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Welcome Back!”);
if (p.teleblocked) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You are teleport blocked!”);
return;
}
break;

But then again when u use the portal, it says im teleblocked if i get teleblocked but it still takes me to the coordinates please help (: thanx .

Read full topic
